dialogue.text: It’s a pleasure to meet you, Sweet. Hope your boat over here wasn’t too hectic.
My lil’ cousin here was worried sick.
My apologies… I got lost on my way here and my service was out… I didn’t mean to make you worry so much.
Don’t worry about it, Sweet. I’m just glad you’re finally here. You wouldn't believe how much I've been looking forward to this.
Well, I’ll leave you two to your plans. I’ve got some studying to catch up on. Have a lovely one!
You too, ma’am. Farewell!
See you 'round, cousin. And... thanks for getting me out of my head.
Don't mention it, hun. I can already tell this girl is something real special. You take good care of her, aight?
Heh, you know I will.
Well, Sweet, without further ado, I welcome you to the hypest place around.
This is Enzync City! Culture capital number one, and homeland of yours truly.
Ah, it's so big and lively! All the buildings here are so much taller than the ones at home.
We've only got a week or two to spend together, and there's so much here, so let's get right into it! You feelin' hungry?
Oh dear-! I was so excited, I've completely forgotten to eat all day!
Then we're definitely fixing that right now! And I got the perfect place! Ever had ramen loaded with all the toppings and extras you could dream of?
Ramen? I've don't think I've heard of such a food.
You forreal? I have a lot of Enzync culture to teach you this week then.
Imma introduce you to one of my top 3 favorite restaurants up east in Togarashi Town! Let's go!
One quick walk to the east later...
Aaaaaaaand here we are.
Oh my gosh! This place is gorgeous! And so serene too.
Yeah, Togarashi Town's got that nice vibe goin' on. Always calm and chill-
Hey!!! You and you! Hold the heck up!!!
...except today apparently-!
I've seen you guys all over the internet! You're those performers that went all rivals-to-lovers in one day! Sweet and Sour!
...is that how people describe it?
Heh, sweet and sour are great on their own, but I'm the best of both worlds!
I'm sweet like cinnamon candy and sour like lime on fiesta chicken! It's Spicy, baby!
It's... nice to meet you?
We're not just here for meeting! We're here for competing too!
It's challenge time! No backsies!
...what? You lookin' for some kind of face-off or something?
Uhh... yeah, duh.
Ah, that would be fun! We'd love to!
You sure this is a good time? We're kinda starvin' right now.
Look at her, Sour! She looks like quite the lively performer, doesn't she?
Yeah, you'll find a lot of that type all over Enzync. But if you insist... Let's do this, Sweet!
Nuh uh uh! This is a 1V1 only! Two on one ain't fair, Greeny! And I wanna challenge Sweety here first!
Forreal? Ugh, aight. Guess I'm waiting then.
You got this, Sweet!
Well, if that’s what you desire, then I'm happy to oblige!
